title: Black Block Documentary 2011 DVD Rip Xvid
description:
First-person testimony of the police brutality around the G8 summit in Genoa, Italy, in 2001. Told by Lena, Niels, Chabi, Mina, Dan, Michael and Muli - who experienced the violence in the raid on the Diaz school and the torture at the Bolzaneto detention center - this film is a testament to them all and a damning indictment of a system that talks about freedom and democracy but that is predicated on control and violence.

XVID DVD RIP without subtitles.

Subtitles at addic7ed.
